R6 class for input-output matrix

iom.Rd

R6 class for input-output matrix.

Public fields

id

Identifier of the new instance

intermediate_transactions

Intermediate transactions matrix.

total_production

Total production matrix.

final_demand

Final demand matrix.

exports

Exports matrix.

imports

Imports matrix.

taxes

Taxes matrix.

wages

Wages matrix.

operating_income

Operating income matrix.

added_value_final_demand

Value added final demand matrix.

added_value

Value added matrix.

occupation

Occupation vector

technical_coefficients_matrix

Technical coefficients matrix.

leontief_inverse_matrix

Leontief inverse matrix.

multiplier_output

Output multiplier vector.

influence_field

Influence field matrix.

Method new()

Creates a new instance of this R6 class.

Usage

iom$new(
  id,
  intermediate_transactions,
  total_production,
  final_demand = NULL,
  exports = NULL,
  imports = NULL,
  taxes = NULL,
  wages = NULL,
  operating_income = NULL,
  added_value_final_demand = NULL,
  added_value = NULL,
  occupation = NULL,
  technical_coefficients_matrix = NULL,
  leontief_inverse_matrix = NULL,
  multiplier_output = NULL,
  influence_field = NULL
)

Arguments

id

Identifier for the input-output matrix.

intermediate_transactions

Intermediate transactions matrix.

total_production

Total production matrix.

final_demand

Final demand matrix.

exports

Exports matrix.

imports

Imports matrix.

taxes

Taxes matrix.

wages

Wages matrix.

operating_income

Operating income matrix.

added_value_final_demand

Value added final demand matrix.

added_value

Value added matrix.

occupation

Occupation matrix.

technical_coefficients_matrix

Technical coefficients matrix.

leontief_inverse_matrix

Leontief inverse matrix.

multiplier_output

Output multipler vector.

influence_field

Influence field matrix.

Method add()

Adds a matrix to a previously imported IO matrix.

Usage

iom$add(matrix_name, matrix)

Arguments

matrix_name

One of final_demand, exports, imports, added_value_final_demand, added_value or occupation matrix to be added.

matrix

Matrix object to be added.

Method remove()

Removes a matrix from a previously imported IO matrix.

Usage

iom$remove(matrix_name)

Arguments

matrix_name

One of final_demand, exports, imports, added_value_final_demand, added_value or occupation matrix to be removed.

matrix

Matrix object to be removed.

Method compute_tech_coeff()

Computes the technical coefficients matrix.

Usage

iom$compute_tech_coeff()

Method compute_leontief_inverse()

Computes the Leontief inverse matrix.

Usage

iom$compute_leontief_inverse(technical_coefficients_matrix)

Arguments

technical_coefficients_matrix

Technical coefficients matrix.

Method compute_multiplier_output()

Computes the output multiplier vector.

Usage

iom$compute_multiplier_output(leontief_inverse_matrix)

Arguments

leontief_inverse_matrix

Leontief inverse matrix.

Method compute_influence_field()

Computes the influence field matrix.

Usage

iom$compute_influence_field(epsilon)

Arguments

epsilon

Epsilon value. A technical change in the input-output matrix.

technical_coefficients_matrix

Technical coefficients matrix.

leontief_inverse_matrix

Leontief inverse matrix.

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

iom$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
